text: ara yakhana tara apanara kache asabe yara amara nidarsanasamuhe bisbasa kare, takhana apani bale dinah tomadera upara santi barsita hoka. Tomadera palanakarta rahamata kara nija dayitbe likhe niyechena ye, tomadera madhye ye ke'u ajnatabasatah kona manda kaja kare, anantara erapare ta'oba kare neya ebam sat haye yaya, tabe tini atyanta ksamasila, karunamaya.
